channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Solution Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Solution Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-2405|2024-08-05T04:21:33.244Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20solution%20manager
item.description: SAP Solution Manager, 7.10, 7.20, Incident Management Work Center allows an attacker to upload a malicious script as an attachment and this could lead to possible Cross-Site Scripting.

item.title: CVE-2018-2361|2024-08-05T04:14:39.619Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20solution%20manager
item.description: In SAP Solution Manager 7.20, the role SAP_BPO_CONFIG gives the Business Process Operations (BPO) configuration user more authorization than required for configuring the BPO tools.
